alert.note: Alert for Greeley; Howard; Sherman; Valley (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 16 at 11:58PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Greeley, southeastern Valley and northeastern Sherman Counties through 1245 AM CDT... At 1158 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over North Loup, or 9 miles southeast of Ord, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Scotia around 1205 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Greeley and Spalding. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for central Nebraska.
